tasks.task: Upgrading a solar power system for a house.
subtasks: Starting with two 100Ah batteries and two 180W panels.
Adding two more 100Ah batteries to increase total capacity to 400Ah.
Adding two more 180W panels, maintaining the same wattage.
Installing panels on both sides of the building to optimize sun exposure.
Upgrading to two 200Ah batteries for increased storage, raising total capacity to 800Ah.

tasks.task: Installing LED lights with lower wattage (10W each) to reduce energy consumption.
Experiencing the benefits of a solar system upgrade, including 24/7 appliance use and cost savings.
Discussing the importance of starting small and gradually upgrading a solar system.
subtasks: Beginning with a smaller solar solution for testing and basic needs.
Expanding the system as demands increase, with consideration for future upgrades.
